basics.name: Jade Fisher
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Resourceful Software Engineer with a proven track record of contributing across the software development lifecycle in varied environments (telecom, aerospace, e-commerce). Excels at quickly understanding new systems and technologies to effectively design solutions, integrate services, optimize performance, and improve development practices. Seeking dynamic roles that demand strong problem-solving skills, adaptability, and a commitment to continuous technical growth.

work.name: Charter
highlights: Developed and implemented client on-boarding processes for a Spring/Lua application, including generating and managing client credentials and adding them to the database for existing and new pathways.
Led investigation into Redis memory creep, optimized DB usage, revised mismanagement policies, and improved system performance at Spectrum.

Worked with internal teams and third-party partners to integrate Spectrum services with major streaming platforms like Paramount, Hulu, Vix, and Disney, ensuring seamless functionality and customer experience.
Upgraded critical APIs from Jax-RS to Spring MVC.
Collected data for networking adjustments and exploring issues on Charter's network traffic during the 2023 Super Bowl.

work.name: Boeing
highlights: Designed and updated Java micro-services with RESTful APIs for a new satellite communication network commissioned by the US Space Force.
Worked in an Agile environment with test-driven development and pair programming.
Updated test procedures and integrated 3rd party testing utilities to streamline code coverage.
Modernized the software review process and updated tools and software to the latest versions.
Communicated between teams and business stakeholders to ensure requirements were understood and met.

work.name: Lockheed Martin
highlights: Designed and updated GUIs using Qt to interface with ground stations and other devices.
Developed ground control systems for the SBIRS program with the US Space Force.
Updated system scripts to transfer data between ground stations as new additions were made to the system.

work.name: ULINE
highlights: Implemented MVC programming to add new features to the website, including a shopping list feature and a display for customer quoted prices.
Fixed HTML/CSS bugs across the Uline.com website.

work.name: APITV
highlights: Worked in C# to interface with Chrysler engines, interpreting hexadecimal codes through a GUI.
Connected remotely with teams worldwide to plan and implement new features.

projects.name: NixOS
projects.description: Learning the NixOS ecosystem, ongoing learning for development machine management.

projects.name: MealMaker9000
projects.description: Use an LLM to generate a weekly meal plan and shopping list based off Daily calorie allotments Create a 'shopping' task and add that to my calendar Sundays at 10am Create 'Events' on my calendar that coenside with meals planned by the LLM

projects.name: OSRSFlipFinder
projects.description: OSRS Flip Finder is a tool designed to help Old School RuneScape (OSRS) players identify profitable item trading opportunities by providing real-time market data and advanced filtering capabilities
